title: Implement segment/ICP weighting in priority scoring with configurable defaults

sections.text: Update the priority scoring algorithm to incorporate the newly persisted segment and ICP-fit attributes when calculating issue/theme priority. Add a small, config-driven weighting layer (with sensible defaults) so Product/Support can tune the influence of segment/ICP without code changes. Ensure missing or conflicting segment/ICP values fall back to neutral weight and do not degrade score generation.
